appetizers.name: Fried Pickles
appetizers.description: Crispy battered pickles fried and served with ranch.

appetizers.name: Queso
appetizers.description: Cheese dip with chilli and peppers. Served with fresh tortilla chips.

coldSandwiches.name: Ham and Cheese Sandwich
coldSandwiches.description: A ham sandwich with your choice of white or whole wheat bread, your choice of american, pepperjack or colby jack cheese, Lettuce and tomato.

coldSandwiches.name: Turkey and Cheese Sandwich
coldSandwiches.description: A turkey sandwich with your choice of white or whole wheat bread, your choice of american, pepperjack or colby jack cheese, Lettuce, tomato and pickle.

hotSandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak Sandwich
hotSandwiches.description: Sliced beef cooked  on a Italan Bread with your choice of american, pepperjack or colby jack cheese and sauteed onions and peppers.

hotSandwiches.name: Meatball Marinara
hotSandwiches.description: A thick meatball sub sandwich with marinara sauce, your choice of american, pepperjack or mozzarella cheese .

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: A creamy cheesecake on a flakey crust.

drinks.name: Pops
drinks.description: Your choice of any available pop.
